full_summary:
=====================================

### Notice of Proposed Procurement for Task-Based Professional Services

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to engage a contracted professional to provide content subject matter expertise under Stream 7 for Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS). This requirement is to augment the DND's exercise development capacity in support of recurring annual training events.

### Overview of the Requirement

The selected supplier will be required to develop tailored, realistic training materials, scripts, and products simulating real-world operational environments. This work will be conducted in Kingston, Canada, with a minimum security requirement of Secret.

### Scope of Work

The supplier is expected to provide:

* Content subject matter expertise under Stream 7 for TSPS
* Exercise development support for recurring annual training events
* Development of realistic, tailored training materials, scripts, and products
* Simulation of real-world operational environments

### Security Requirements

The security level for this requirement is Secret, and suppliers must comply with the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

### Selection Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the combined merits of technical qualifications and price.

### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: W6599-24-X038
* Tender Closing Date: December 4, 2024, at 14:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 3, 2025
* Expected Contract End Date: February 2, 2026
* Tender Description:  [Please see the RFP documents for further details]

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), among others.

### Contact Information

For inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal, please contact:

Terry Merritt
TSPS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA
Phone: (613) 271-7760

### Important Notes

* RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to qualified suppliers.
* Bidders must comply with the requirements outlined in the RFP documents.
* The Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers interested in becoming a "Qualified SA Holder" should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA. [END] ​
